Activity: Quick check on emails and address any urgent requests or questions from the vendor or internal stakeholders.
Begin reviewing the current EHR system's documentation focusing on data collection capabilities, reporting functionalities, and integration options.

Contact @EHRDev-1 and @EHRDev-2 (EHR Integration Developers) to understand the technical aspects of data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) from the EHR system. Ask for insights on potential challenges and limitations.
Review provided documents on data collection from @EHRDev-1 and @EHRDev-2, and prepare a summarized report to be discussed with other related colleagues.
Lunch Time. Maybe read an interesting article about data interoperability in healthcare.

Conduct a thorough assessment of the EHR system's capabilities for influenza data collection. Identify any gaps or limitations in meeting the hospital's requirements. Document findings in a detailed report.

Consolidate findings into a comprehensive report that compares existing EHR capabilities against the hospital's requirements. Highlight any areas where the EHR system falls short. Create a detailed Gap Analysis report.
Send the Gap Analysis report to @ITPM-1, @ClinLead-1, @HIS-1, @HIS-2, @EHRDev-1, @EHRDev-2, and @DA-1, @DA-2 (Data Analysts) for review and feedback.
